message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $22,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so feel free to share your thoughts.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer. How about we meet halfway at $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $13,500? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.
